tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My experience with Dr. Gandhi was absolutely amazing.

I have a condition called amelogenesis imperfecta, due to which my teeth have little to no enamel, and they are yellow, oddly shaped and weak by nature. Since childhood, I have faced many issues; not being able to smile confidently, not being able to socialise very much, to name a few.

Dr. Gandhi has been with me every step of the way, expertly filling cavities, and making my teeth look aesthetically pleasing with the help of veneers and composite. His treatment gave me the much needed confidence that was so absent from my life.

Recently I was suggested by him that it was finally time for a more permanent solution, crowns. So, we decided to go through with the treatment and it was the best decision I have ever made. He carried out the treatment with extreme precision and care, and now I have the best smile I could have ever asked for. I can laugh freely, I can smile freely, I can talk to anyone without subconsciously thinking that what would the other person think about my teeth. I will forever be grateful to him, and I truly believe that no other person could have done this good of a job.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I just landed in Dr. Kapil's Chamber by organic search for good Dental Care doctor, on an emergency Tooth pain. Outcome is I have decided to my Dental Guide for Long Term.

I got my Root Canal, Filling & Scaling to close with, the Journey through out was Transparent, Caring, State of Art expertise, Use of Latest advanced technology for tooth caring.

What stood out for me :
1. Dr. Kapil's Expertise and Experience ( in safe hands)
2. Complete Transparency.
3.  Precision Cleanliness
4.  Relief of symptoms
5. Addressing Long Term Tooth Caring Prophylaxis

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was an amazing experience at Dental Masters. Dr Kapil Gandhi and his support staff are very polite and helpful and they did the procedure perfectly. There was no waiting time. The clinic is extremely clean.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Alongwith being an excellent dentist, Dr Gandhi's way of working with my child and to get him to cooperate was just amazing. Also he did not use unnecessary injections. Instead even though it must have been inconvenient for him to work with my kid whose threshold of pain is bare  mininum he still managed to do it without giving local anesthesia. 
His way of explaining everything in detail was very helpful. But what really impressed me was the follow up after half an hour of treatment whether my child was in pain or not. 
Excellent doctor. Will highly recommend!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am/was an anxious patient when I visited Dr Gandhi with toothache that I had been avoiding for quite some time thinking i can manage it with homely remedies (Clove etc.). When I visited him, anxious and crying in pain, he made sure to be polite, caring and examining me with lot of care. He explained the problem to me and ensured I first get out of the pain before we move to actual treatment-which was tooth extraction. On the day of the extraction, he worked with me very slowly, settling my anxieties and questions at first, then explaining each and every step, making the environment caring/less stressful and the job was done in few minutes. I am grateful to him. I must also mention the good staff he has who ensured cleanliness of the clinic, played music of my choice and kept a smile on their faces to relieve of my unnecessary tension. Thank you Dr Gandhi, I have a lot more work on my teeth to be done and I am sure going to go back to you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am extremely satisfied with Dr. Kapil Gandhi's treatment course for my 5y old son. I was really fearful about how my son is going to manage for his dental treatment as he was really anxious when I took him to other 2 doctors. But then through Practo I read and found about Dr. Kapil Gandhi's repute and I thought of consulting him for my son. I must mention here that in first meeting itself I felt so much satisfied with the way he dealt with my son with being very very polite and on the same time being a little disciplined so that he can forget his worries and feel safe in his hands. I have had 3 sittings till now with him for my son's dental cavities and caries and all have gone very very well. As I was asked by another doctor that my son will need to go through all the treatment in GA (General anesthesia), but then Dr. Gandhi **** ** ********* ** *** ******* said that no we need to have faith on child and decrease his anxiousness and slowly and steadily treat him in opd itself. Even the tooth, which another doc recommended to be extracted, Dr. Gandhi is trying to save that too with treatment. Also, every time he has answered my queries (being anxious for my child) so nicely and in elaborated manner, to make us feel completely satisfied parents. So all in all I am so much thankful to him for all his efforts with my child and way of his treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review:
I have traveled from UK and was referred to Dr Kapil in dental masters . Dr Kapil did the complete analysis of situation with respect to pain , infection on my tooth and started my treatment.

He planned the whole activity keeping the constraints of time my availability and my medical condition .

Dr Kapil not only did excellent procedure but also ensured that I am fully informed , maintained  transparency , high level of professionalism , friendly and calm. 

In less than 4 sittings I am feeling like normal , relieved and relaxed with no ache etc .

Thank you Doctor Kapil and am amazed that you are offering such a great treatment , not bloating the issue monetary reasons and ensuring comfort of patient .

Thank You ,

Manish

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had a problem where my upper corner tooth had a severe pain and the pain was hitting d nerves.
I approached Dr Kapil Gandhi for root canal treatment...
 Dr Kapil Gandhi and his staff were extremely professional and patient   throughout d process...The tooth is working perfectly now..
Best Wishes
Kapil Kumar

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have visited Dr Gandhi to get treatment for my 3.5 year old daughter. It has been a heartening experience to see a young child being treated with such patience and utmost care. Dr Gandhi handled her with such expertise that my child would look forward to going back to the clinic after every appointment. One would shudder to think that a child so young has to go through a root canal procedure but my daughter was so confident by the assurance given by the entire team at the clinic that she would even doze off while the treatment would be ongoing. Such is the command that the doctor has , that my daughter would often simply smile when she was told about going to "the nice doctor uncle. "

review:
Dr Kapil is very professional and maintains cleanliness and hygiene.
The clinic has the latest facilities for regular dental as well as advanced surgery.
Charges are very reasonable.
The doctor has a soft touch and gives patient comfort during treatment.
I strongly recommend this clinic for Dental problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Even after taking an appointment and speaking to the doctor personally on the timings, he had a wait time of 30 minutes at the reception. Even on being an urgent matter, the doctor refused to hurry the process and was unpleasant. Overall would not recommend anyone to visit this doctor.
reply_text:
Dear Maam

We are extremely apologetic for your experience as not being at par to your expectations.

Our clinic policy is very clear that we don't rush our already appointed patients and that too in the operatory. We had therefore requested you to wait.

On your request we accomodated your last minute change of the appointment.

Wishing you best.

Regards

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental X-Ray,Space Maintainers,Dental Sealant,Dental Examinations,
review:
We had a great experience with Dr. Kapil Gandhi. My daughter had bad experiences with other pediatric dentists and was very anxious about the appointment and any procedure, but Dr. Kapil was very patient with her. It was heartening to see that even though her procedures required extraction, root canal, fillings, she never complained about anything. Dr. Kapil Gandhi gave detailed explanation on what the procedure will be followed and what alternatives we have, this made us feel confident that our kid was in safe hands.
It's not easy to find a good dentist for your kids, I highly recommend Dr. Kapil Gandhi for kids and adults.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: So I am writing this review after the completion of my nephew's process. He was not eating properly and had constant pain, luckily we came to Dental Masters we did RCTs and other procedures as suggested. Everything was so transparent and with a perfect explanation. The most important thing was how my nephew became friends with everyone around. It was amazing to see how excited a 5 year old could be for his dental sessions. He just loved it here so much that now growing up he wants to become a Pediatric Dentist like Dr. Kapil sir. üòÉ The staff here Saurav and Anjali are friendly and best part is they keep taking a follow up. They are not some overpriced fancy dental outlets but professional pocket friendly and concentrate on getting the job done with minimal pain and maximum treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Child teeth problem,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Cavity Filling,Dental Cavities,
review: What a great experience here, I have finally found a wonderful dentist after trying several others. My 5 year old son came in fearful and nervous, by the time he was to be worked on he was happy and confident that everything was going to be okay. Dr.Kapil Gandhi and his staff did an amazing job and were so kind and caring with my son during the whole process. He is exceedingly patient and creative in his approach with children. He takes time to explain what is going on and what needs to be done. I highly recommend this place, especially if you have little ones who are nervous about seeing the dentist. Thank you Dr. Kapil Gandhi for everything that you do for your patients!!

Dr Kapil is an amazing dentist! By far the best that I have come across.
He‚Äôs very friendly and listens to you with complete patience. 

The best thing I like about Dr Gandhi is that he gives a lot of importance on the quality of service and makes sure that the patient leaves with a good+satisfied experience.

The staff is also very professional and accommodating. 

I will definitely be continuing my check-ups at Dental Masters. 

Thank you so much for removing the fear of dental procedures!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Meeting Dr Gandhi was nothing short of a sigh of relief for us. My son chipped one of his teeth and we were made to run to three different dentists none of whom was able to give us a correct diagnosis or line of treatment not to mention unnecessary tests. Dr Gandhi not just diagnosed the condition correctly but also offered the correct line of treatment.

He is absolutely amazing with kids and has a very conservative ( minimalist) approach to treatment that I loved. I will definitely recommend him for all procedures related to kids.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: ** ***** ** ** ********* ************ He is extremely gentle with children and an expert in his field. He treated my 3 year old son for cavities and cleaning. Because of his friendly nature and patient attitude my son was super comfortable throughout the treatment. To everyone's surprise he actually enjoyed the process. And we as parents are very satisfied with the doctor and the end result of the treatment. We would highly recommend all the fellow parents to reach to Dr Gandhi for any kind of paediatric dental problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I am a 5 year old . My mom took me to Dr.Kapil Gandhi because I had a bad tooth ache and the x ray confirmed that the infection had reached the pulp cavity of 2 premolars and I needed to have RCT done for both the teeth in order to save them for the next 5 years until they fell on their own(because they were milk teeth)..I was really scared that the dentist would give me an injection..But Dr.Gandhi became my friend and did my root canal without a prick...
There was absolutely no pain and today he successfully completed the first rct and has started with the second one.He is the best pedodontist and he even gives me balloons everytime I see him for an appointment...He is my buddy now...thank u Dr. Gandhi.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We consulted Dr Kapil for our son(4yrs) who had an extreme case of dental caries. The precautionary measures taken by him and his staff during these pandemic times were commendable. Dr Kapil explained each and every aspect of the procedure in detail, and answered all our queries about full mouth rehabilitation (under GA). It's such a relief seeing the child being able to eat properly now and positive effect on his overall growth. We are deeply thankful to him and his entire medical team for the professional manner in which the procedure was conducted and post surgery care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: we had met more than 10 dentist's for our 5 year old son as he had dental cavities , which needed minor operation / full mouth rehabilitation. after meeting me.gandgi we knew our son was in right hands - be it doctor experience , his friendliness with kids , knowledge of the subject and yes , cost too. a painful process of operating a kid was made simple and without any side effects within 1.30 hrs , which we dreaded for 1 yr as parents. we are thankful we found Mr.Gandhi on Practo and would recommend him to all parents who seek support in dentistry for their kids. thanks Mr.Gandhi .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Endo Surgery Or Apicoectomy,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental X-Ray,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review: I had cyst in my gums and hence the treatment that I had to go through was RCT for 3 teeth, a surgery and capping for RCT tooth and all of that within 3 months time period before my marriage. Not only he treated it nicely but he ensured that the treatment is complete well before time so I will be absolutely comfortable before my marriage as my front teeth were involved. I came all the way from Dwarka. But trust me it was worth it. Thank you Dr. Gandhi for the amazing work and comfort that you and your staff has provided :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Very happy with the services. Very well explained the problem and advised accordingly. Will be happy to recommend.

Support service is excellent. They are courteous and  dutiful. It

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Cleaning,
review:
Dear all 

I would like to share my wonderful experience about Dr. Kapil Gandhi (Dentist) at Triton Hospital Kalkaji Delhi. 

Dr. Kapil Gandhi is very polite and friendly and equiped with great experience and knowledge. He is very caring and nice human being. He allows the patient / attendent proper time to explain difficulties in very friendly environment. He listen the patient / attendent very carefully and explain the treatment and cost involved therein very clearly in a transparent way. The hospital is very clean, well maintained and equipped with modern equipment and latest technology and as far as cost and quality of treatment is concern, I have experienced best treatment at very reasonable cost. Accordingly in my view one should prefer Dr. Gandhi for best treatment at very reasonable cost.

CA Sitesh Kumar Jha

context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Cleaning,Dental Fillings,
review:
Dear all 

I would like to share my wonderful experience about Dr. Kapil Gandhi (Dentist) at Triton Hospital Kalkaji Delhi. 

Dr. Kapil Gandhi is very polite and friendly and equiped with great experience and knowledge. He is very caring and and nice human being. He allows the patient / attendent proper time to explain difficulties in very friendly environment. He listen the patient / attendent very carefully and explain the treatment and cost involved therein very clearly in a transparent way. The hospital is very clean, well maintained and equipped with modern equipment and latest technology and as far as cost and quality of treatment is concern, I have experienced best treatment at very reasonable cost. Accordingly in my view one should prefer Dr. Gandhi for best treatment at very reasonable cost.

CA Sitesh Kumar Jha
